summary: Jessica and Gus, two apathetic teenagers, drift aimlessly from one day to the next until they meet each other. They make a tenuous and fleeting connection when Gus confides in Jessica about his dark past.
cast: Cole Pensinger|Anna Kavan|Ryan White|Sarah Bing|Natalie Buller|Brendan McFadden|Chad Hartigan|Lorraine Bahr
title: Dance Party, USA
